hopobject.name: ombh
hopobject.body: This expansion board provides a LCD Module with touchscreen and some peripherals (speaker, microphone, earpiece). The design is made to fit inside a Openmoko Freerunner plastic case so that one can port/develop mobile phone GUI software stacks (SHR, QtMoko, etc.) to the Beagle Board. The projects provides an adapted variant of U-Boot and kernel sources.
hopobject.shortdesc: Expansion board with VGA LCD/Touch, Microphone, Earpiece that fits into an Openmoko Case
